original_text: All of these were recorded in genealogies in the days of Jotham king of Judah, and in the days of Jeroboam king of Israel.
korean_text: 이상은 유다 왕 요담 때와 이스라엘 왕 여로보암 때에 족보에 기록되었더라

sentences.original_text: All of these were recorded in genealogies
in the days of Jotham king of Judah
and in the days of Jeroboam king of Israel
